name: Don't Lose The Light
description:
Hey, 

I'm Beam, a hobbyist and learner game developer, developing their first game in Godot! 

The game, provisionally called "Don't Lose The Light" is a survival horror game concept designed around the idea that your light source is your life. 

Over time your light source will deteriorate, and if it gets dark enough you die. Torches can be found where your torch can put them out to replenish your light. Barriers will also be in your way that need to be burnt, which will also cost light.

More is planned, however, if you have any ideas let me know! You can find my, Twitter, dev log here: https://twitter.com/Beam_Logs
